InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: DayBreak
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Sakura Sun knows exactly what you need. The DayBreak is a straightforward power plant that provides parity to its performance, durability, and stealth stats.

InstalledItem.Name: 5MA 'Chimalli'
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Thanks to Behring’s expert engineers, the 5MA ‘Chimalli’ shield generator balances the need for a solid regeneration rate with dependable damage absorption.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor-Lite
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

There’s a lot for you to worry about on those long hauls. Don’t let your radar’s performance be one of them. You can count on the Surveyor-Lite from Chimera Communications to provide the durability and performance that you need.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.
